QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Timing of breastfeeding
QAPair.Answer: Expect that it may take 2 to 3 weeks for you and your baby to get into a breastfeeding routine. Breastfeeding a baby on demand is full-time and exhausting work. Your body needs energy to produce enough milk. Be sure to eat well, rest, and sleep. Take good care of yourself so you can take good care of your baby.
